text: Tamra sathe tara sampradaya bitarka karala. Se balalah tomara ki amara sathe allahara ekatbabada samparke bitarka karacha; athaca tini amake patha pradarsana karechena. Tomara yaderake sarika kara, ami taderake bhaya kari na tabe amara palakarta'i yadi kona kasta dite cana. Amara palanakarta'i pratyeka bastuke sbiya jnana dbara bestana kare achena. Tomara ki cinta kara na
